item.title: Winx Club: The Magic is Back announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out in April 2026.

Publishers Maximum Entertainment and developer Iron Frog have announced Winx Club: The Magic is Back for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch in April 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Maximum Entertainment:

About

Winx Club: The Magic is Back captures the essence of the Winx universe, delivering an enchanting experience with a mix of magical combat, puzzle-solving, and cooperative gameplay with a friend. Play as all six members of the Winx Club, each with their own magical abilities.

Key Features

  • Play as Your Favorite Fairies – Play as all six members of the Winx Club, tailoring your experience based on your preferred character and their abilities. Freely switch between all five of the Winx while playing.
  • Explore Iconic Settings from the Winx Universe – Attend Alfea College and journey to familiar and distinct Winx locations, including The Enchanted Forest, The Coastal Cliffs, and The Desert Ruins of Red Fountain.
  • Winx Action in Your Hands – Engage in combat against fantasy creatures, where you’ll use each character’s unique magical abilities to bring peace to the lands. Upgrade spells to strengthen your fairies for even more fun.
  • Play with a Friend – With two-player local cooperative play, you and a friend can enjoy Winx Club together!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: SAND: Raiders of Sophie launches in Q1 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Open-world extraction shooter gets a subtitle.

Open-world player-versus-player-versus-environment extraction shooter SAND: Raiders of Sophie, formerly just SAND, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam in Q1 2026, publisher tinyBuild and developers Hologryph and TowerHaus announced.

“In the weeks since the playtest, we’ve been hard at work going through all the feedback and suggestions we received from our players,” Hologryph and tinyBuild said in an update. “After careful consideration, in order to ensure we meet the expectations of our players and are able to properly address everything we’ve learnt from the playtest, we need a little more time. As a result, we’ve decided to move the game’s launch to Q1 2026.”

The companies continued, “Releasing the game is a milestone we only get one chance to hit, and we want to make sure that when we do, it reflects our vision and delivers the best possible experience for our community.”

While an exact date was not announced, tinyBuild and Hologryph said it is confident in its estimate of how long it will take to address teh remaining areas of the game that require attention, and expect to share a release date early in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via tinyBuild:

About

SAND: Raiders of Sophie is an open-world player-versus-player-versus-environment extraction shooter where players operate giant walkers across the post-apocalyptic dunes of a fallen planet. Battle rival players, explore, loot and extract valuable resources in a hostile, ever-changing world.

In order to effectively traverse this harsh and dangerous planet, you will design and deploy Tramplers, gigantic walking bases that will shield you from the elements, defend you and your loot against other players and destroy anything that obstructs your pursuit of becoming the most notorious pirate upon the dunes!

Key Features

  • Build, Customize, and Command Gigantic Mechanical Walkers – Tramplers, your most loyal companion, which you can build from the ground up, act as a mode of transport, a main base, primary storage, protection from the elements, and a most formidable weapon.
  • Thrilling First-Person Player-Versus-Player-Versus-Environment Combat – Team up with a group of friends or enter the world solo and go head to head with other players and the undead former inhabitants of this hostile planet with a variety of weapons in frantic first-person combat, or weaponize and fortify your trampler and engage in massive-scale combat upon the dunes of Sophie.
  • Explore a Fallen Civilization, Loot, and Extract – The cities left in ruin upon Sophie hold untold riches, but danger lurks around every corner. Sail the world, scour the abandoned streets, monuments, and wrecks, recover valuable loot, weapons, and resources, and fight off rival pirates before extracting with your spoils.
